questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and Illustration in a window
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) An artistic illustration in a window
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A person walking
C) An illustrated character in a window
D) A group of animals

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A painting
C) An illustrated character holding a bag
D) A car

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A beach
B) A forest
C) A house roof reflection
D) A busy street

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A river
B) A window with an illustration
C) A mountain
D) A group of people

What does the illustrated character appear to be holding?
A) A pet
B) A musical instrument
C) A bag with groceries
D) A book

What is the character in the illustration wearing?
A) A swimsuit
B) A lab coat
C) A jacket
D) A superhero costume

What is the character in the illustration likely doing?
A) Shopping
B) Swimming
C) Playing music
D) Dancing

What is reflected in the window?
A) A tree
B) A car
C) A roof with skylights
D) A billboard

What is the character holding in their left hand?
A) A book
B) A musical instrument
C) A shopping bag
D) A pet

What is the main color of the illustration?
A) Blue
B) Red
C) Black and white
D) Green

What does the illustration suggest about the character's activity?
A) They are going to work
B) They are shopping for groceries
C) They are going to a party
D) They are exercising

What type of window is shown in the photo?
A) A bay window
B) A sliding window
C) A casement window
D) A double-hung window

What kind of bag is the character holding?
A) A backpack
B) A briefcase
C) A grocery bag
D) A handbag

What additional detail is visible in the character's bag?
A) A loaf of bread
B) A bouquet of flowers
C) A book
D) A pet

What is the character's overall appearance?
A) Professional
B) Casual
C) Sporty
D) Formal

What is the condition of the building's exterior wall?
A) Newly painted
B) Weathered
C) Covered in graffiti
D) Under construction

What element is not present in the photo?  
A) Trees  
B) Cars  
C) People  
D) All of the above

A) Watercolor
B) Pencil sketch
C) Digital art
D) Oil painting

A) Sunglasses
B) Earrings
C) Hat
D) Scarf

What is the character's posture?
A) Sitting
B) Running
C) Standing
D) Lying down

What is the character's gender?
A) Male
B) Female
C) Indeterminate
D) Non-binary

A) Trees
B) Cars
C) Roof reflection
D) People

What is the illustration's artistic style?
A) Realistic
B) Impressionistic
C) Cartoonish
D) Abstract

What is the cartoon character holding?
A) A book
B) A bag of groceries
C) A laptop
D) A pet
